text: Solomon ga helekai, “Kooe dela ne haga modongoohia do aloho damanaiee gi dogu damana go David, dau dangada hai hegau. Mee gu humalia gu hagalongo ge manawa dahi adu gi di Goe. Goe gu haga modongoohia aga labelaa do aloho dee odi gi mee, mai i dau wanga gi mee dana dama daane e dagi i dono lohongo dangi nei.
